content.html: #TIL setting up a testable mail server can fit in a tweet Setup: docker run -p 8025:8025 -p 1025:1025 mailhog/mailhog Test: curl "smtp://localhost:1025" --mail-from 'from@foo.com' --mail-rcpt 'to@bar.com' -T <(echo -e 'Subject: Hello\n\nWorld!') open http://localhost:8025
content.value:
#TIL setting up a testable mail server can fit in a tweet

Setup:
docker run -p 8025:8025 -p 1025:1025 mailhog/mailhog

Test:
curl "smtp://localhost:1025" --mail-from 'from@foo.com' --mail-rcpt 'to@bar.com' -T <(echo -e 'Subject: Hello\n\nWorld!')
open http://localhost:8025
